column4: Fujitsu i installed it but my pc becomes slower so i wanted to try with aiglx

Fujitsu the only way is installing xserver-xgl
Fujitsu yeah by default desktop effects doesnt work

Fujitsu but my computer becomes slower

ok you definitely don't want Xgl then
what's the output of 'lspci | grep VGA' ?
that is why i wanna try aixgl
00:02.0 VGA compatible controller: Intel Corporation Mobile GM965/GL960 Integrated Graphics Controller (rev 0c)
ok you just need to unblacklist it, join #compiz-fusion
